en_title: SJ and SED visit Community Vaccination Centre at Education Bureau Kowloon Tong Education Services Centre (with photos)
zh_title: 律政司司長和教育局局長到訪教育局九龍塘教育服務中心社區疫苗接種中心（附圖）

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, and the Secretary for Education, Mr Kevin Yeung, today (March 17) visited the Community Vaccination Centre (CVC) at Education Bureau Kowloon Tong Education Services Centre to inspect its operation and to give encouragement to the staff members.

Ms Cheng and Mr Yeung were briefed by the centre supervisor on the operation of the CVC, and took the opportunity to chat with the healthcare personnel and staff members working there. They were pleased to note that the CVC, operated by the Hospital Authority, had been operating smoothly, and that the response to the vaccination arrangements has been positive.

Ms Cheng and Mr Yeung expressed their gratitude to all the healthcare personnel and staff members there for helping the Government vaccinate members of the public. They also called on members of the public in the priority groups of the COVID-19 Vaccination Programme to be vaccinated early for the protection of themselves and others.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師和教育局局長楊潤雄今日（三月十七日）到訪教育局九龍塘教育服務中心社區疫苗接種中心，視察中心的運作情況，並為中心的工作人員打氣。
鄭若驊和楊潤雄聽取中心主任介紹該中心的運作情況，並與醫護和工作人員交談，欣悉該所由醫院管理局營運的中心運作暢順，市民亦對接種的安排滿意。
鄭若驊和楊潤雄向所有在場醫護和工作人員表示謝意，感謝他們積極協助政府為市民接種疫苗；二人並同時呼籲屬於優先組別的市民盡快接種疫苗，護己護人。
